description: Play a game of TicTacToe against the bot!
extended: In the future, you will be able to challenge someone to a match, but this is not implemented yet.
RULES:
X is the Player, O the bot.
To make a move, simply type [rowNumber] [lineNumber] counting from the bottom left corner.
The bottom-right corner would be 3 1, the top right one 3 3.
Send {CANCEL_WORD} to stop playing any time.
